channel.title: Who wants to be Gman, APPLY NOW (MACHINIMA)!!!
channel.description:
We are still looking for an actor who can impersonate G-Man VERY well, if you've got the microphone and the talent...ring me up (PM). The position is for me and my friend's machinima which I have named "The Bivium" or (The Crossroads/meeting of two paths or destinies). The machinima will/does take place between half life 1 and half life 2. It will eventually cover the episodes 1, 2, and 3 and then possibly Half-Life 1 (Through Black Mesa Source)
Dr. Magnusson: [b][i][COLOR='Red']Freeman! What are you doing? Apply now![/i][/b]
